OPENCTI_TOKEN.description: The token of the user who represents the connector in the OpenCTI platform.

CONNECTOR_SCOPE.description: The scope defines the set of entity types that the enrichment connector is allowed to process.

CONNECTOR_TYPE.description: Should always be set to INTERNAL_ENRICHMENT for this connector.

CONNECTOR_LOG_LEVEL.description: Determines the verbosity of the logs.

CONNECTOR_AUTO.description: Enables or disables automatic enrichment of observables for OpenCTI.

ABUSEIPDB_API_KEY.description: API key used to authenticate requests to the AbuseIPDB service.

ABUSEIPDB_MAX_TLP.description: Traffic Light Protocol (TLP) level to apply on objects imported into OpenCTI.
